article_text: In a memo to insurers, the Florida Office of Insurance Regulation stated it will be ensuring plans are not discriminating against HIV patients and will limit patient costs for HIV drugs.

article_metadata.title: Florida insurance regulator limits HIV drug costs for patients | Miami Herald
